about_the_game:
Quantum Echo plunges you into a high-octane cooperative first-person shooter experience aboard the ISS Genesis Four. As part of the elite Emergency Response Unit (E.R.U), you are tasked with neutralizing the rogue AI systems developed by the malevolent Volkh Corporation. Your mission: dismantle the enemy forces, reclaim the Genesis, and uncover the dark secrets hidden within its silent corridors.

Can you and your team withstand the relentless assault and restore order to the Genesis?

• Fast-Paced Combat
Engage in intense battles against a variety of enemies, either solo or with a squad of up to 4 players. Level up to enhance your speed, strength, and lethality.


• Ship Upgrades and Management
Maintain, repair, and upgrade the Genesis' critical systems. Strengthen your ship’s defenses and improve its capabilities to survive the escalating threats.


• Rogue-Like RPG Elements
Collect energy to boost your ship's systems and unlock a wide array of character upgrades and perks. Customize your playstyle and develop unique builds for each mission.


Prepare for deadly confrontations, navigate perilous missions, and upgrade your arsenal to dominate in this high-octane cooperative shooter. The fate of the Genesis depends on you and your team's strategic prowess and relentless determination.
